attributes.action: To teach BSL in all schools
attributes.additional_details: So many people have hearing loss or are deaf, frustrated because people can't communicate properly. And for years we've come along so well as a country yet we still don't teach BSL in schools.
attributes.background: Everyone keeps saying "All needs to be included" so why not start teaching BSL in all schools?

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599565
